feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
